【江峰時刻】70年民族劫難《七》：胡耀邦下台只有他一個人反對

05 Nov 2019, 05:20

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月05日訊】【江峰時刻】70年民族劫難《七》 「小平你好」的幕後；八十年代美國對華軍事科技援助密情；胡耀邦下台只有他一個人反對（歷史上的今天20191103第381期）
1984年，「十一」遊行，陳希同組織的首度群眾國慶隊伍中，雖然沒有高高舉起鄧小平的畫像，但是當年北大的師生打出了「小平您好」的橫幅。
在基辛格精心培養十多年的的美國政治外交精英團隊的遊說下，美國總統頒布43號行政令，在整個八十年代，開始全面的幫助中國在教育、能源、農業、太空、地質、商務、公共健康各領域獲得全面的科學技術服務支持。
1994年，高爾品放棄國內的一切物質條件，流亡海外，堅持宣傳民國理念，堅持他所知道的真相，他就是我們很多在海外的華人所熟知的辛灝年先生。

[Jiangfeng Moment] 70 years of national catastrophe "seven": Hu Yaobang stepped down only one person opposed

05 Nov 2019, 05:20

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 05, 2019] [Jiangfeng moment] 70 years of national catastrophe "seven" "Xiao Ping Hello" behind the scenes; the United States in the 1980s military technology assistance to China; Hu Yaobang step down only one person opposed (Historically today, 20191103, issue 381)
In 1984, during the "Eleventh" parade, Chen Xitong's first mass national day team did not raise Deng Xiaoping's portrait, but the teachers and students of Peking University played the banner of "Xiao Ping Hello".
Under the lobbying of the team of American political and diplomatic elites that Kissinger has carefully cultivated for more than a decade, the President of the United States issued Executive Order No. 43. Throughout the 1980s, he began to comprehensively help China in education, energy, agriculture, space, geology, Comprehensive scientific and technical service support in all fields of business and public health.
In 1994, Gao Erpin gave up all the material conditions in the country, went into exile, insisted on promoting the concept of the Republic of China, and insisted on the truth he knew. He is Mr. Xin Yannian, whom many of us overseas are familiar with.
